short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of YouTube shorts. Play, pause, fast forward, rewind, adjust volume, and easily navigate video timelines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your YouTube experience with our extension designed for shorts! Take full control of your viewing with features like play/pause, fast forward, rewind, and volume control. Seamlessly navigate through video timelines by clicking on the progress bar. Enjoy the convenience of controlling short videos on YouTube exactly the way you want.
